articles.description: Many think Covid-19 is similar to flu. Here’s all you have  to know about influenza and howto prevent catching it this winter
articles.content: BENGALURU : As the Covid-19 outbreak continues to evolve, we often come across patients who are drawing comparisons between the virus and influenza.  While winter is setting in, a sharp rise in the i… [+3313 chars]
